a, b, c = map(int, input().split())  # map(function, iterable)

print(min(a + b, a + c, b + c))

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(min(a + b, a + c, b + c))


# get input
A1, A2, A3 = map(int, input().split())

# calculate
ans = min(abs(A2 - A1) + abs(A3 - A2), abs(A3 - A1) + abs(A2 - A3), abs(A3 - A2) + abs(A1 - A3))

# output
print(ans)

# output
print(ans)


# get inputs and calculate
A1, A2, A3 = map(int, input().split())
ans = min(abs(A2 - A1) + abs(A3 - A2), abs(A3 - A1) + abs(A2 - A3), abs(A2 - A3) + abs(A3 - A1))

# output
print(ans)

# coding: utf-8

# get input
A, B, C = map(int, input().split())

# calculate
ans = min(abs(B - A) + abs(C - B), abs(C - A) + abs(B - C), abs(B - C) + abs(A - B))

# output
print(ans)
